snippet: In a blog post, Mr. Musk says nothing about the Autopilot controversy, while envisioning a future of self-driving buses and tractor-trailers....
abstract: Tesla chief exec Elon Musk vows to expand automaker's self-driving technology to pickups, semitrucks and buses; blog post does not comment on fatal May accident involving firm's Autopilot system which spurred investigations by federal agencies and prompted Transportation Dept to make guidelines for self-driving vehicles.
lead_paragraph: In a blog post, Mr. Musk says nothing about the Autopilot controversy, while envisioning a future of self-driving buses and tractor-trailers.

headline.main: Elon Musk’s Tesla Plan: More Models, More Self-Driving
headline.print_headline: Tesla’s Chief Envisions Expansion of Self-Driving Technology to Trucks and Buses
